nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Hypergolic Ionized Ceramics\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Obtained from expired hypergolic\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"fuel.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"First the gabagool fuel is\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"vitrified through calcination,\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"then stabilized using a\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"phosphate-based crystalline\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"ceramic host through an ion\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"exchange, or something...\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Right-click to view recipes!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
